articles.title: EU plan for common worldwide phone charger port takes step closer - CNA
articles.description:
BRUSSELS: The European Union's bid to adopt a common charging port for mobile phones, tablets and headphones took a step forward on Wednesday (Apr 20) when an EU panel backed the proposal, paving the way for an assembly vote next month.
